title: Scaling Infrastructure for Global Apps
author: John Doe
summary: How we managed to scale our cloud services to support millions of concurrent users worldwide.
content:
Scaling for millions of users requires more than just adding more servers. It's about architecture, caching, and smart resource management.

## Edge Computing
By moving computation closer to the user, we reduce latency and improve the overall experience of global applications.

## Automated Scaling
Modern infrastructure should be able to breathe. It should expand during traffic peaks and contract during lulls to manage costs effectively.
